messages.title: No Lower Thames Crossing
messages.content: My priority is scrapping the proposed Lower Thames crossing. But we don't want to see the crossing sited upriver at Dartford, where air pollution levels are already dangerously high. The Green party will fight for investment in ports and rail infrastructure, to have freight moved from the roads to safer, more sustainable routes, and for reliable, affordable and joined-up public transport.

messages.title: This Election Isn't About the Next 5 Years. It's About the Next 50 Years.
messages.content: Only the Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit. Only the Green Party has the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country, and our place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics. Every Green vote on 8th June will help make that vision a reality. We want to shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment. To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services. And to put power back in your hands through a citizen's democracy. If you agree with us, stand with us. The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up. But it's in your hands. Stand with us for housing, schools, our NHS, our environment, and our future. We stand up for what matters.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Scrap the proposed Lower Thames crossing, invest in ports and rail infrastructure for safer and sustainable routes, and ensure reliable, affordable and joined-up public transport.
Offering real opposition to the Government's extreme Brexit, vision for an alternative future for the country.
Build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services, empower citizens through democracy.
